## Heart data

The goal is to predict the binary outcome `AHD` (`Yes` or `No`) of patients.

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### R

```{r}
# Load libraries
library(GGally)
library(gtsummary)
library(ranger)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)

# Load the `Heart.csv` data.
Heart <- read_csv("Heart.csv") %>% 
  # first column is patient ID, which we don't need
  select(-1) %>%
  # RestECG is categorical with value 0, 1, 2, 3
  mutate(RestECG = as.factor(RestECG)) %>%
  print(width = Inf)

# Numerical summaries stratified by the outcome `AHD`.
Heart %>% tbl_summary(by = AHD)

# Graphical summary:
# Heart %>% ggpairs()
```

#### Python

```{python}
# Load the pandas library
import pandas as pd
# Load numpy for array manipulation

# Set font sizes in plots
sns.set(font_scale = 1.2)
# Display all columns
pd.set_option('display.max_columns', None)

Heart = pd.read_csv("Heart.csv")
Heart
```
